existing_features.title: On the AuthGate landing page hero section, minimize/remove the vertical gap between the selected hero image element (XPath: /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/section[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/img[1]) and the selected main headline element (XPath: /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/section[1]/div[1]/div[1]/h1[1]) by adjusting spacing styles ONLY on these two selected elements, without changing spacing for any other elements in the hero section (e.g., subheadline, CTA buttons).

new_feature_requests.summary: Remove extra spacing between elements/sections (user requested: "Remove the Space between")
